projects.title: Pulse Clash
projects.subtitle: Arcade duel driven by heart-rate sensors
projects.description: Two-player arcade where each player's heart rate changes the difficulty for their opponent. Exhibited at V2_ Lab for the Unstable Media.

content.title: Overview
content.body: I designed and implemented a two-player arcade game where heart rate drives game difficulty. The result is a playful yet competitive installation piece.

content.title: Approach
content.body: Custom sensor readouts feed into a game loop that tunes parameters in real time. The difficulty scaling keeps matches energetic and unpredictable.

content.title: Exhibitions
content.body: Shown across multiple exhibitions at V2_ Lab and beyond.
